SELECT METHOD_NM AS conectMethod , NVL(SUM(CREAT_CO),0) AS creatCo , NVL(SUM(UPDT_CO),0) AS updtCo , NVL(SUM(RDCNT),0) AS inqireCo , NVL(SUM(DELETE_CO),0) AS deleteCo , NVL(SUM(OUTPT_CO),0) AS outptCo , NVL(SUM(ERROR_CO),0) AS errorCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) AS statsDate
, 0 AS statsCo FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}
AND SVC_NM LIKE '%' || #{detailStatsKind} || '%'
GROUP BY METHOD_NM, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4)
GROUP BY METHOD_NM, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)
GROUP BY METHOD_NM, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)

SELECT COUNT(CONECT_ID) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) AS statsDate
, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) AS statsDate
, '' AS conectMethod , 0 AS creatCo , 0 AS updtCo , 0 AS inqireCo , 0 AS deleteCo , 0 AS outptCo , 0 AS errorCo FROM COMTNLOGINLOG WHERE CONECT_ID = #{detailStatsKind}
AND TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) ORDER BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2)
